title: Late Night Lit: Maggie O'Farrell | Jesmyn Ward
description:
On today's episode of our books podcast, Late Night's Sarah Jenks-Daly speaks with Maggie O'Farrell, award-winning novelist and author of Hamnet.

She also talks to two-time National Book Award winner Jesmyn Ward to discuss her new monthly book club with Literati.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
